game.name: Masha and the Bear Picnic Fun
game.description:
Masha and the bear have just planned out for a most awaited picnic party. They both are anxiously seeking for someone who could help them to decorate the picture. Are you able to assist both of them to decorate in order to make the unforgettable picnic today? Show your inner skills and create an awesome picture with the most in-demand heroes â€“ Masha and the bear. These two both cute characters trust on your talents a lot, so please try to avoid the mistakes while striving hard to achieve the goal in Masha and The Bear Picnic Fun game.

Paying attention to details will help to deliver the best outcomes in the least time possible. The proper utilization of the mouse allows you to decorate the picture in a way you expected. You will see both Masha and the Bear sitting on the grass. In this cute free online girls game, you will have to choose various other vital things right from the picture, such as the background, the threes, the decorations around Masha, the basked with food, a blanket, food from the picnic and so on.   

Go through the instructions and indications properly to complete the game in a proper way. Choose one thing at a time from the picture with Masha and the bear. We are sure that you are having great fun while exploring all the tasks of this cool html5 game. Keep patience and come forward from your comfort zone and let the world show that you are a real gamer with real imagination.
